## Project Overview
This is a Next.js web application for managing university schedules in Google Calendar.

## Technologies
- Next.js 15 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Google APIs (Calendar, Sheets)
- OAuth 2.0 authentication

## Key Features
- Fetch schedule data from Google Sheets
- Add/delete/update events in Google Calendar
- Interactive sheet selection
- Display meeting links from teacher database
- Responsive web interface

## Code Style
- Use TypeScript with strict typing
- Follow Next.js App Router conventions
- Use server actions for API calls
- Implement proper error handling
- Use Tailwind CSS for styling
